description: The bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number WS3763470670 (Doc3800195720) dated  2023-02-07 with a closing of 2023-03-21 at 02:00 PM EDT. AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by June 15, 2023 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. This requirement is for PWGSC located at 100 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, ON to provide preventative maintenance and inspection services. There are security requirements associated with this requirement. There is an optional site visit associated with this requirement. The site visit will be held at TBD, Ottawa ON on 2023-05-25 10:00am  for security clearance purposes only for two days and no other information will be revealed. Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than 2023-05-19 14:00EDT to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) and date of birth(s) of the person(s) who will attend.
full_summary:
# **Synopsis of the Tender: EJ196-231383 Kitchen Equipment Maintenance Services**

## **Key Details**

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3763470670
* **Publication Date**: 2023-05-08
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 15, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2023
* **Location**: Connaught Range Building 4 Snider, National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Service Description**: Preventative maintenance and inspection services for kitchen equipment at PWGSC buildings

## **Amendments and Updates**

* This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number WS3763470670 (Doc3800195720) dated 2023-02-07.
* The tender closing time has been updated to June 15, 2023, 2:00 p.m. EDT. All bids must be submitted by this time to be considered responsive.
* There is an optional site visit associated with this requirement, which will be held on May 25, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. EDT.

## **Important Requirements**

* Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than May 19, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) and date of birth(s) of the person(s) who will attend the site visit.
* Security requirements are associated with this requirement, and bidders must meet these requirements to be consideredresponsive.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted electronically through the Ariba Discovery portal.

## **Contact Information**

* Contact Name: Christine Seguin (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: christine.seguin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: Not Available
* Contact Fax: Not Available

## **Procurement Details**

* This procurement is subject to the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, and other listed trade agreements.
* This procurement is open to all qualified bidders, and bidders must be able to demonstrate their ability to meet the requirements specified in the tender document.  The Government will evaluate bids based on the lowest price.
The rewritten entry has been condensed into approximately 400 words while maintaining the key details and requirements of the original text. The format has been made more concise and
